# Domination (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Gruumsh]], [[Hextor]], St. Cuthbert, Wee Jas |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** You gain [[Spell Focus (Feat)|Spell Focus]] (enchantment) as a bonus feat.

**Domination Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Command (Spell)|Command]]****:** One subject obeys selected command for 1 round.

**2** **[[Enthrall (Spell)|Enthrall]]****:** Captivates all within 100 ft. + 10 ft./level.

**3** **[[Suggestion (Spell)|Suggestion]]****:** Compels subject to follow stated course of action.

**4** **[[Dominate Person (Spell)|Dominate Person]]****:** Controls humanoid telepathically.

**5** **[[Command, Greater (Spell)|Command, Greater]]****:** As *[[Command (Spell)|command]]**,* but affects one subject/level.

**6** **[[Geas_Quest (Spell)|Geas/Quest]]****:** As *[[Geas, Lesser (Spell)|lesser geas]]*, plus it affects any creature.

**7** **[[Suggestion, Mass (Spell)|Suggestion, Mass]]****:** As *[[Suggestion (Spell)|suggestion]]*, plus one subject/level.

**8 [[True Domination (Spell)|True Domination]]:** As *[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]],* but save at â€“4.

**9 [[Monstrous Thrall (Spell)|Monstrous Thrall]]:** As *[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]]*, but permanent and affects any creature.
